title: EGA Controlled Vocabulary (CV) for assay subtypes by array [EFO:0002696]
description: Controlled Vocabulary (CV) list for assay subtypes by array: any ontologized term for a subtype (i.e. child ontology) of an array assay [EFO:0002696]. If you cannot find your term in the CV list, please create an issue at our [metadata GitHub repository](https://github.com/EbiEga/ega-metadata-schema/issues/new/choose) proposing its addition.
